pr_title: feat(groovyw): add command to create dependency dot file

timeline.message:
feat(groovyw): add command to create dependency dot file

- integrates all direct and recursive dependencies of the given module (or all if "all" or "*" or "")
- can be visualized e.g. using graphviz using `dot -Tsvg dependencies.dot > dependencies.svg`

timeline.bodyText: do we care about loosing this formatting with the text?
timeline.author: pollend

replies.bodyText: Didn't check all of the formatting changes the IDE did tbh, but true, that should be retained.
replies.author: jdrueckert

timeline.message: fix: formatting of Ansi constants section
